headline.main: HOUSE TELLS FISH TO IGNORE SUMMONS; Bids Judiciary Committee See Whether Grand Jury Subpoena Invades Its Privileges

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 10 -- The House instructed Representative Hamilton Fish, Republican, of New York, today to "refrain from responding" to a summons to appear Wednesday before the grand jury of a United States court investigating Nazi propaganda.
abstract: House adopts McCormack resolution on Fish's Cong immunity to subpoena
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 10 -- The House instructed Representative Hamilton Fish, Republican, of New York, today to "refrain from responding" to a summons to appear Wednesday before the grand jury of a United States court investigating Nazi propaganda....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
